attributes.action: Save Totteridge Road Post Office from Closure
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government policy to close local Post Offices will be damaging to local communities. Vulnerable groups of society including the elderly rely on local facilities such as Post Offices to get by. The Totteridge Road Post Office also services the needs of many students at Bucks New University and we petition the Government and the Prime Minister to save it from closure.
